      • _updatePoint

        protected void _updatePoint​(GeoPointMetaData point,
                            java.lang.String label,
                            java.lang.String sublabel,
                            double distance,
                            double bearing,
                            boolean displayRB,
                            double speed,
                            double heading,
                            boolean estimate,
                            double height,
                            double area,
                            boolean teamMate,
                            CoordOverlayMapReceiver.ElevationDisplayInfo el)
        This is the uber formatting function from ATAK 2.0+
        Parameters:
        point - the point to use
        label - the label
        sublabel - a sublabel if it exists
        distance - the distance to the red X
        bearing - the bearing to the red X
        displayRB - true if the distance and bearing are to be shown
        speed - the speed
        heading - heading
        estimate - if the speed and heading are estimated
        height - the height of the item
        area - the area
        teamMate - if the item is a team mate
        el - the elevation model for the case where a surface model is shown.
